blogPost.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
blogPost.body: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
blogPost.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul
blogPost.author: Nick Franklin

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。

previous.excerpt: Create tailored B2B sales emails with a click. Magic Sales Bot uses GPT-3 to create high-converting emails to send to your prospects, allowing you to prospect 10x faster.
previous.title: Magic Sales Bot - Write sales emails 10x faster with GPT-3

localize.description: 一键创建定制的B2B销售邮件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3创建高转化率的电子邮件发送给您的潜在客户，让您的潜在客户速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，销售邮件的撰写速度提高了10倍。

localize.description: 一鍵創建定製的B2B銷售郵件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3創建高轉化率的電子郵件發送給您的潛在客戶，讓您的潛在客戶速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，銷售郵件的撰寫速度提高了10倍。

next.excerpt: Opal is your go-to app for Digital Wellbeing. Join thousands of people saving time daily, experiencing more productivity, better sleep, lower stress, and better focus each day. Use Opal to disconnect distractions from your phone & focus on what matters to you.
next.title: Opal - Take control of your phone 💎📲

localize.description: Opal是您的数字健康应用的首选。加入成千上万的人的行列，每天节省时间，体验更高的生产力、更好的睡眠、更低的压力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，让你从手机中解脱出来，专注于对你来说最重要的事情。
Opal是您的數字健康應用的首選。加入成千上萬的人的行列，每天節省時間，體驗更高的生產力、更好的睡眠、更低的壓力和更好的注意力。使用Opal，讓你從手機中解脫出來，專注於對你來說最重要的事情。
